about_the_game:
FIGHT - LOOT - EXPLORE

Deep down in an otherworldly chasm, beyond space and time, a frog-like creature and its weird little sidekick struggle to outrun an ominous pursuing force. Outnumbered and outmatched by relentless foes and treacherous terrain, their only choice is to fight their way upwards through a weird, chaotic abyss 

WORLD 

  • 15 vertical, handcrafted scrolling levels that challenge your timing, skill, and nerves

  • 5 biomes, each with unique gameplay mechanics and bosses, littered with hidden routes and secrets to uncover (some only accessible with certain traits or items)  

  • Puzzle Rooms, Challenge Rooms, Speedrun Mode and optional challenges for those who like to keep it real (and an easier mode for those who don't) 

COMBAT 

  • Responsive and intense combat where you must rely on skill, cunning, and reflexes 

  • Use upgradeable spells to blast your opponents to bits, shield yourself from projectiles or impact the environment to turn the tables on your unassuming enemies 

  • Combo-mechanics that reward skillful and/or aggressive playstyles 

SHOP & ROGUE MECHANICS 

  • Buy new spells, items and upgrades from the mysterious Elder Frog, who runs an interdimensional shop with randomized inventory, allowing you to craft and modify your playstyle between each level 

  • Gain permanent, otherworldly powers by defeating the five main bosses

name: GRODA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: GRODA is an intense arcade experience, blending nerve-wracking action with precision platforming and rogue elements
